about_the_game:
Simple game in wich you can entertain and relax yourself.
Squares flying in many directions from you moves in new game mechanic.
You should slide the squares by the path and dont touch others squares.
Different levels and challenges is waiting for you in the game.

- Relaxing game for all family
- New game mechanic with flying squares in many directions
- 60 fantastic different levels
- New game challenges
detailed_description:
Simple game in wich you can entertain and relax yourself.
Squares flying in many directions from you moves in new game mechanic.
You should slide the squares by the path and dont touch others squares.
Different levels and challenges is waiting for you in the game.

- Relaxing game for all family
- New game mechanic with flying squares in many directions
- 60 fantastic different levels
- New game challenges

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G3900 / AMD Athlon X2
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 1024 MB / AMD Radeon R5 230 1024 MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4620 / AMD A4-7300
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 2048 MB / AMD Radeon R7 240 2048 MB
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 1.4GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Squares

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP1+ 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G3900 / AMD Athlon X2
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 710 1024 MB / AMD Radeon R5 230 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP1+ 32 bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4620 / AMD A4-7300
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 2048 MB / AMD Radeon R7 240 2048 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
